group_1.textRight: So everyone in Janomiya's doin' well now, huh...?

group_1.textLeft: Yeah. We got the apology we'd wanted,
and we were able to get rid of the one who didn't @regret what she'd done~
But Torayamachi...must be having a hard time @right now~

group_1.textRight: Everyone left,
so right now, Yuna and I have the base to ourselves.

group_1.textLeft: I don't get it~ @Why are you saying that with a smile~?

group_1.textRight: Oh, when Sakuya comes back, it'll be three of us.

group_1.textLeft: Wait, which gang do you think I'm with~?

group_1.textRight: Aren't you with Ryuugasaki?

group_1.textLeft: I thought I was with you in Torayamachi~
Though I'm not entirely sure now.

group_1.textRight: Really...?

group_1.textLeft: Because you're such a yes-girl for Yuna that you'd @say white was black if she told you so~
So if you called me a Torayamachi member at @this point, I'm not sure I could take it seriously~

group_1.textRight: Ah, I guess you're right.
Either way, Yuna wants everyone to go over to Ryuugasaki,
and I'm with her on that one.

group_1.textLeft: You really are an empty shell, Hikaru~

group_1.textRight: As long as I'm with Yuna, I'm full.

group_1.textLeft: That so~?

group_1.textRight: What are you gonna do now, anyway?

group_1.textLeft: Everyone else in Janomiya has joined Ryuugasaki @already.
But I still can't make up my mind...
Maybe after I lost the last battle, I got a little respect @for her...
Yuna, I mean.

group_1.textRight: So you're in Torayamachi after all?

group_1.textLeft: I dunno~

group_1.textRight: [chara:102201:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Aw, c'mon!

group_1.textLeft: I'll probably stay indecisive until the end~
Nobody knows how the game will end, and @Torayamachi is on a time limit.

group_1.textRight: How shrewd...

group_1.textLeft: Who's that?

group_1.textRight: It's...Sakuya!

group_1.textLeft: Sakuya! Where the heck are you?!

group_1.textRight: Whoa, what?! Didn't Yuna tell you?!

group_1.textLeft: She told me you were in some city gatherin' information.

group_1.textRight: That's right. Yuna let me spend a ton of her money.
Wait, no, that's not important!
I went to the city where the missing girl had been @seen last, but I couldn't find her.
So after that, I went to the city where we'd last @heard from her.

group_1.textLeft: Did you find her there...?

group_1.textRight: Not a trace.

group_1.textLeft: Does that mean the whole thing's a bust?!

group_1.textRight: That's what I thought too, but then I finally found @her on my way back home.

group_1.textLeft: Then it's a success!

group_1.textRight: We're back in Futatsugi now, so can you bring Yuna @to meet us?
And bring a Grief Seed if you can.
Did you get that?!

group_1.textLeft: Huh? Oh!
Aye!

group_1.textRight: There's something that Yuna needs to know...

group_1.textLeft: What'd she say?

group_1.textRight: She found the Torayamachi girl who'd been @chasing a Witch down.

group_1.textLeft: Huh...

group_1.textRight: It sounds like some kinda emergency.
